mapper.select: SELECT EZC_MGR_LOG.LOG_SEQ AS logSeq /* 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_MGR_LOG.MGR_ID AS mgrId /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MGR_LOG.LOG_TYPE AS logType /* 로그 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_MGR_LOG.CONTENT AS content /* 내용, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_MGR_LOG.CONN_IP AS connIp /* 접속 IP, VARCHAR2(15) */ ,EZC_MGR_LOG.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MGR_LOG.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_MGR_LOG.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MGR_LOG.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_MGR_LOG /* 운영자 로그 */ ,EZC_MGR /* 운영자 정보 */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_MGR_LOG.MGR_ID = EZC_MGR.MGR_ID AND EZC_MGR.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_MGR.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_MGR_LOG.LOG_SEQ = #{logSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_MGR_LOG_PK(P),SYS_C0011484(C) */ AND EZC_MGR_LOG.MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20), FK_EZC_MGR_EZC_MGR_LOG(R),SYS_C0011485(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_MGR_LOG /* 운영자 로그 */ ,EZC_MGR /* 운영자 정보 */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_MGR_LOG.MGR_ID = EZC_MGR.MGR_ID AND EZC_MGR.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_MGR.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD
AND EZC_MGR_LOG.LOG_SEQ = #{logSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_MGR_LOG.MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MGR_LOG.LOG_TYPE = #{logType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 로그 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_MGR_LOG.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 내용, VARCHAR2(1000) */
AND EZC_MGR_LOG.CONN_IP = #{connIp, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 접속 IP, VARCHAR2(15) */
AND EZC_MGR_LOG.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MGR_LOG.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_MGR_LOG.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MGR_LOG.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT EZC_MGR_LOG.LOG_SEQ AS logSeq /* 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_MGR_LOG.MGR_ID AS mgrId /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MGR_LOG.LOG_TYPE AS logType /* 로그 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_MGR_LOG.CONTENT AS content /* 내용, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_MGR_LOG.CONN_IP AS connIp /* 접속 IP, VARCHAR2(15) */ ,EZC_MGR_LOG.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MGR_LOG.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_MGR_LOG.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MGR_LOG.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_MGR_LOG /* 운영자 로그 */ ,EZC_MGR /* 운영자 정보 */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_MGR_LOG.MGR_ID = EZC_MGR.MGR_ID AND EZC_MGR.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_MGR.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD
AND EZC_MGR_LOG.LOG_SEQ = #{logSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_MGR_LOG.MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MGR_LOG.LOG_TYPE = #{logType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 로그 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_MGR_LOG.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 내용, VARCHAR2(1000) */
AND EZC_MGR_LOG.CONN_IP = #{connIp, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 접속 IP, VARCHAR2(15) */
AND EZC_MGR_LOG.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MGR_LOG.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_MGR_LOG.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MGR_LOG.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_MGR_LOG.LOG_SEQ DESC /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_MGR_LOG SET /* 운영자 로그 */ LOG_TYPE = #{logType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 로그 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,CONTENT = #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 내용, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,CONN_IP = #{connIp, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 접속 IP, VARCHAR2(15) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND LOG_SEQ = #{logSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_MGR_LOG /* 운영자 로그 */ WHERE 1=1 AND LOG_SEQ = #{logSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
